hero.title: Empowering Women in Rwanda
hero.description: Join our platform to access resources, connect with events, and find job opportunities tailored for women in Rwanda. We're here to support your personal and professional growth.

objective.title: Our Objective
objective.description:
We aim to empower women in Rwanda by providing access to vital resources, educational opportunities, and a supportive community.

Our goal is to foster growth, collaboration, and success among women in our city, creating pathways to economic independence and leadership.

healthcare.name: Healthcare
healthcare.description: Access health resources and services tailored for women

education.name: Education
education.description: Discover learning opportunities and skill development programs

finance.name: Finance
finance.description: Find financial literacy resources and funding opportunities

networking.name: Networking
networking.description: Connect with other women professionals and mentors

stories.name: Jane Doe
stories.content: Thanks to Rwanda Women Hub, I found a job that I love and met amazing women who inspire me every day! The resources and networking opportunities have been invaluable to my career growth.

stories.name: Mary Kwizera
stories.content: The resources provided here helped me start my own business. I couldn't have done it without this platform! The mentorship program connected me with experienced business leaders who guided me through challenges.

callToAction.title: Join Our Community Today
callToAction.description: Get access to exclusive resources, networking events, and job opportunities designed specifically for women in Rwanda.

community.description: Connect with other women, share experiences, ask questions, and find support.
community.guideline1: Be respectful and considerate to all community members
community.guideline2: Keep discussions relevant to women's interests and needs
community.guideline3: Share personal experiences but respect others' privacy
